channel.title: Comments on: Banzai Differential Brace & Transmission Crossmember

item.title: By: JT
item.dc:creator: JT
item.description: Great Blog! I just recently purchased a .. handful myself and this has a lot of good information. I really appreciate it.
item.content:encoded: Great Blog! I just recently purchased a .. handful myself and this has a lot of good information. I really appreciate it.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2012/12/banzai-differential-brace-transmission-crossmember/#comment-343046">Dominic Martino</a>.
The transmission crossmember is a worthy install, but I think the differential brace is mostly useless. Definitely not worth the hassle of installing it, you would be better served going with a brace of superior design.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dominic Martino.

The transmission crossmember is a worthy install, but I think the differential brace is mostly useless. Definitely not worth the hassle of installing it, you would be better served going with a brace of superior design.
